Filtering mode.help_text: Whether to use Blacklist Mode, Whitelist Mode, or Greylist Mode (not yet supported).

Hangup mode.help_text:
How aggressively to hang up a blacklisted call.
Standard- hangs up the call without sending any audio back.
Aggressive- hangs up the call using a modem handshaking sequence.

Off-device programming.help_text: Append to or replace current lists with those from usb drive, or export lists from device to usb drive

Display timeout.help_text: The time of inactivity in seconds before the screen turns off
